column5: This hill-country cabin hideaway is a wooden work of art. Explore the natural beauty of the area with a visit to Hamilton Pool, Reimer's Ranch, Krause Springs or Muleshoe Park.   We're also conveniently located so guests can get to Austin for live music and The Hill Country Galleria for shopping. Venture a little further West to experience the local vineyards.   There's plenty to do and see or just kick back and relax.
